column1: Here you will learn how to use the Pathlib standard Python library
that interestingly is often seen as a substitution for the well-known OS library.
Add Prefix to All Filenames in Folder
Changing the prefixes of all the files contained in a folder.
Renames specific files on a folder-name basis using Pathlib.
Rename All Files Based on Sub-Sub-Folders
Add Created Date to All Filenames in Folder
